name: @codidact/co-design
description: Co-Design is the design and component framework for Codidact
author: luap42

scripts.css_symlink: mkdir -p docs && (readlink docs/assets || ln -s $(pwd)/assets docs/assets) && mkdir -p dist && (readlink docs/dist || ln -s $(pwd)/dist docs/dist)
scripts.setup: npm run -s css_symlink && npm run -s js_symlink
scripts.build: npm run -s css_build && npm run -s js_build && npm run -s css_symlink && npm run -s js_symlink && npm run -s docs_build
